meta.description: I’m Zhilin Huang, a Master student from Peking Univerity. I received the B.S. degree from Harbin Institute of Technology, Harbin, China. My research interests include image inpainting, multimodal learning and semantic segmentation.
meta.author: Zerin Hwang

pages.text: I’m Zhilin Huang, a Master student from Peking Univerity. I received the B.S. degree from Harbin Institute of Technology, Harbin, China. My research interests include image inpainting, multimodal learning and semantic segmentation.

Confidence-based Global Attention Guided Network for Image Inpainting Zhilin Huang, Chujun Qin, Lei Li, Ruixin Liu, Yuesheng Zhu MMM2021 Semantic-Aware Context Aggregation for Image Inpainting Zhilin Huang, Chujun Qin (Co-author), Ruixin Liu, Zhengyu Wen, Yuesheng Zhu ICASSP2021
